Wool/agent_test.go.description: Created comprehensive agent and role validation tests following table-driven test patterns. Tests cover all Role methods, Agent.Validate() with 30+ cases, ValidationError, default configs, and type aliases.

Wool/.description: Wool package test coverage verified via static analysis: role_test.go (322 lines, 9 tests) + agent_test.go (600 lines, 9 tests) = 18 test functions covering all 11 public functions/methods. All switch branches tested including edge cases. Estimated coverage: >80% (likely 100%).

tests/e2e/test_delegation.go.description: E2E test suite created with 15 test functions. Uses httptest.Server to mock TheLoom backend responses including hidden states. Tests message routing (@junior/@senior prefix parsing), agent creation/lifecycle, chat with hidden state extraction, conversation flows, and session integration. Module path: github.com/r3d91ll/weavertools/tests/e2e

tests/e2e/harness_test.go.description: Created E2E test harness that manages TheLoom server as subprocess. Features: auto-port selection, health endpoint polling, graceful degradation to mocks, environment variable overrides (E2E_LOOM_PORT, E2E_THELOOM_PATH, E2E_SKIP_SERVER), TestMain entry point for setup/teardown, thread-safe singleton pattern.
